price: 110. Hij wil dat jullie allen uw land verlaten, wat is jullie advies?”
arabic: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخۡرِجَكُم مِّنۡ أَرۡضِكُمۡۖ فَمَاذَا تَأۡمُرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: yurīdu an yukh'rijakum min arḍikum famādhā tamurūna
